 Vi erbjuder en fokuserad yrkesmiljö och rådgivning till ledande företag inom bank, försäkring och asset management. Här får du unika möjligheter att utvecklas och anta utmaningar i en professionell miljö i framkant av finanssektorn.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden:**
 Du arbetar med centrala frågor för finans- och riskavdelningar i svenska och europeiska företag, ofta i internationella team med kollegor från Norden och Europa. Dessutom får du tillgång till seminarier och kurser som stärker din konsult- och branschkompetens.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer för tjänsten**
* 2-3+ års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet
* Masterexamen eller högre inom relevant område
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Egenskaper för att lyckas i rollen**
* Starka analytiska färdigheter och förmåga att lösa problem på ett strukturerat sätt
* Intresse för att arbeta i och driva projekt
* God förmåga att bygga förtroende och relationer samt trivs med att arbeta i team
* Proaktiv, nyfiken och självgående
* Energi, engagemang och mod att leda samt utmana etablerade arbetssätt


**Vad vi erbjuder dig**
* Kontinuerligt lärande: Du utvecklar tankesätt och färdigheter som hjälper dig att navigera in i framtiden.
* Framgång så som du definierar den: Vi ger dig verktygen och flexibiliteten, så att du kan göra skillnad på ditt sätt.
* Transformativt ledarskap: Vi ger dig insikter, coachning och självförtroende för att bli den ledare som världen behöver.
* Inkluderande kultur: Du kommer att accepteras för den du är och få möjlighet att använda din röst för att hjälpa andra att hitta sin.


 Läs gärna mer om vad EY kan erbjuda dig på Karriärsidan, i sociala medier och på Karriärbloggen.
   

  

**Är du redo att ”Shape your future with confidence”?** 
**Ansök idag.**
 Välkommen att söka tjänsten! Vänligen skicka in din ansökan senast den
 **31 januari 2026** 
 . Urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Vid frågor gällande tjänsten, kontakta Martina Policastro på Martina.Policastro@se.ey.com. Vid frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Adrian Lyng på Adrian.Lyng@se.ey.com. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
 *Observera att en bakgrundskontroll kommer att genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.*
 På EY främjar vi en inkluderande miljö och värdesätter olikheter. Vi uppmuntrar ansökningar från kandidater med olika bakgrunder och strävar efter en rättvis rekryteringsprocess. Vid behov av stöd eller anpassningar, kontakta vårt rekryteringsteam på recruitmentsweden@se.ey.com.
   

  

**EY | Building a better working world**
 EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.
   

  

 Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
   

  

 EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: Cloud Advisory Consultant
description:
Are you passionate about helping organizations unlock the full potential of cloud technologies? Do you enjoy leading cloud transformation initiatives, shaping cloud strategies, and guiding customers through modernization and optimization of their IT landscape?


Influence Tech is growing, and we’re looking for a Cloud Advisory Consultant with strong experience in cloud architecture, cloud strategy, and technology modernization to join our team and support some of Sweden’s most well-known organizations in their cloud journeys.


We are a team of technology consultants with deep expertise in Tech Advisory, Tech Management and IT Architecture, helping organizations make informed and strategic technology decisions. We offer services in cloud optimization, tech strategy, IT governance, solution architecture, automation technologies and core business systems, always with a human-centric, value-driven approach.

**Your Role:**


* Take on senior cloud advisory and cloud architecture roles within projects, cloud implementations and transformation initiatives, or act as a senior expert towards our clients
* Provide strategic advice and expertise in areas such as cloud architecture (Azure/AWS), cloud operating models, cloud governance, security, and cost optimization
* Lead assignments focused on cloud modernization, migration planning, platform design, standardization and optimization of cloud and hybrid environments
* Develop and drive cloud strategy and cloud architectural roadmaps through close collaboration with cross-functional teams
* Stay current with cloud trends, best practices, emerging services and industry developments to continuously enhance our service delivery
* Coach and mentor junior consultants, fostering their professional growth within cloud and architecture
* Contribute to the expansion of our company by supporting business development, recruitment and the evolution of our Cloud, Architecture and Strategy offerings
  



**Your Experience:**

* 6–12 years of experience in cloud architecture, cloud advisory, IT architecture or related fields
* Experience working with Azure, AWS or other cloud platforms in roles such as Cloud Architect, Cloud Advisor, Solution Architect or similar
* Strong understanding of cloud governance, cloud security, cost management (FinOps), platform engineering or cloud operating models
* Experience driving cloud or hybrid-cloud transformation programs, including modernization, migration, or large-scale optimization initiatives
* Ability to translate business needs into cloud strategies and actionable roadmaps
* Strong communication skills and confidence working closely with clients and stakeholders
* Experience supporting sales, pre-studies or the development of cloud-related consulting offerings
**Preferred Experience:**

* Certifications such as Azure Architect Expert, AWS Solutions Architect, TOGAF, ITIL, SAFe, or similar
* Experience in automation, DevOps, CI/CD or infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, Bicep, CloudFormation)
* What We Offer
* The opportunity to work on fantastic projects – in areas like ERP and HR core system implementation, technology strategy, automation and AI agents, cloud optimization, and IT governance.
* A flat, collaborative company structure focused on work/life balance rather than internal processes.
* Projects that allow you to combine technology capabilities with a human-centric approach.
* A culture that embraces innovation, collective intelligence, and doing things differently.
* An active role in shaping the future of our company – contributing to offerings, practice areas, and recruitment efforts
**Who we are:**


Influence Tech is a fast-growing Tech Management Consulting firm located in the heart of Stockholm. We’re expanding, and we’re looking for people who want to build something extraordinary with us.  




  

We combine deep technology expertise with a warm, human-centric culture, and we’re not afraid to rethink traditional consulting to create real value for our customers.


If you’re someone who loves creating impact, takes initiative, and thrives in an environment where your ideas matter, you’ll feel right at home.


As part of the Newground Alliance, fourteen specialist consulting companies and 280+ consultants. We share the belief that consulting should be done with integrity, quality and care. Our motto “Consulting Done Right” means delivering sustainable results while making sure our people feel supported, appreciated and empowered.


We review applications continuously, and we’re excited to meet our next colleague

title: Devops-engineer Defence
description:
**Professional Galaxy** is an IT and technology consulting company that provides highly specialized expertise in IT, software development, SAP, purchasing, electronics and mechanical design. We collaborate with experienced senior experts and deliver strategic value-creating expertise to some of Sweden's most complex and analytically demanding projects. Our focus is always on high quality, professionalism and clear, measurable results.


Are you the right person for the assignment, or do you want to recommend a strong candidate? Do not hesitate to contact us.


Feel free to apply today, selection and interviews take place on an ongoing basis.


Professional Galaxy is looking for a **Devops-engineer Defence** on behalf of our client


Design and maintain efficient CI/CD pipelines for embedded C++ products. Development is done in an air gapped environment which means work is done 100% on site (not possible to work from home).

**See competence requirements and required skills for more info :**

* Many years of experience and a proven track record in development, modernization and maintenance of CI/CD and DevOps operations and automation in big SW design organizations.
* Experience in the development of embedded SW is a requirement.
* This person must be very driven and have strong communication skills, be "customer oriented" and actively reach out to the relevant stakeholders, and come up with solutions that makes a big positive impact in terms of effectiveness in our operations, and quality of our products..
* Strong DevOps and CI/CD competence in relevant technologies and tools such as Git, Jenkins, Python, Groovy, Docker, Bash, Kubernetes, Linux, etc.


Approved security check requirement before starting date!


Swedish Citizenship requirement

**Other Information :**

**Duration :** 2026-01-05 till Open

**Application Deadline** : 2025-12-29

**Work Model : On-site**  

  

Please apply directly through our system with:

* Your updated CV
* Availability to start the assignment


In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education and personal qualities.

**Please note:** We do not accept any applications through mail. All applications have to be sent through the portal to be valid.

title: Data Analyst with strong data engineering skills
description:
We’re hiring a Data Analyst with strong data engineering skills to play a key role in building and maintaining our single source of truth, connecting our systems, and turning high-quality data into meaningful insights.


Could that be you?

##### **The role**


As a Data Analyst at Visiba, you’ll bring clarity and structure to our data landscape. You’ll work closely with several teams and stakeholders including Product Development, Commercial, and Management - becoming the connector who ensures everyone speaks the same data language and makes decisions based on trusted metrics. Together, you’ll identify improvements and optimise areas related to performance, efficiency, quality, and information.


As our dedicated Data Analyst, you’ll own the analytics function end-to-end: from integrations and pipelines to insight generation and recommendations that shape our product, operations, and growth strategy.

*The role is a unique blend of hands-on data engineering, deep analysis and storytelling – perfect for someone who loves both building the engine and interpreting what comes out of it.*

###### **What you’ll do**

* Define and maintain consistent KPIs across teams to maximise value
* Develop dashboards and reports in Power BI
* Provide clear insights and recommendations to guide business and product decisions
* Collaborate with product development and commercial organisation to analyse product usage, behaviour patterns, performance and adoption
* Own and further develop Visiba’s BI platform (Microsoft Power BI) and data warehouse structures
* Integrate core systems (product data, CRM-system, CS tools, finance) into a unified data layer
* Build reliable automated data pipelines
* Collaborate with developers to improve instrumentation and tracking
* Ensure data quality, reliability and accessibility end-to-end

 *In short: you’ll build the foundation, the structure and the shared understanding that helps Visiba move faster and smarter.*

##### **‍️ ‍️ Who you are**


You’re someone who loves when data starts to speak and knows that great insights depend on strong fundamentals. You feel at home with SQL, data models, integrations, dashboards, and turning complex information into clear recommendations.

**You likely have:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Business Intelligence, economics, management, statistics or similar
* 5+ years work experience within analytics, data engineering or equivalent
* Experience building and maintaining pipelines, data models and integrations
* Strong SQL skills and experience working in Azure Data Factory
* Experience with BI tools (Power BI is a plus)
* Solid understanding of data quality, standardisation, KPIs and metrics
* Proven ability to translate business questions into analytical frameworks and deliver insights that drive action
* Strong communication skills and the ability to turn complex data into clear, actionable insights
* Experience analysing product and business data
* Experience from agile or cross-functional environments
* Fluency in English and Swedish

**Bonus points if you have:**

* Experience from SaaS or healthcare
* Experience building dashboards for multiple teams
* An understanding of DevOps practices
* A basic understanding of Power Query/M


You don’t need to be a full Data Engineer but you should enjoy data flows, structures and making sure everything just works.

##### **Who will help you succeed**


You’ll be part of the Operations Team and work closely with colleagues across the whole company. Your closest manager will be me, Elin – and my goal is to support your growth, autonomy and impact.

##### **Why join Visiba?**


Your work will have real meaning. You’ll help build tools that improve people’s health and well-being – together with humble, curious and driven colleagues who care deeply about our mission.

**We offer:**

* A meaningful product with real-world impact
* A strong, value-driven culture where people matter
* 30 days’ paid vacation
* 1 hour/week wellness time during working hours
* Wellness allowance & medical insurance
* Hybrid work model (50% remote)
* Great opportunities to shape your role and grow with us


… and much more


**Location:** Gothenburg


**Start:** As soon as we find the right person


Send your application in English or Swedish – whichever you prefer.


We do not accept applications via email. Selection is ongoing, so please submit your application as soon as possible!

##### **About Visiba**


Visiba has been developing smart technology to help healthcare providers deliver better care since 2014. Today we’re at the forefront of AI-supported triage with Red Robin – a CE-marked medical device software developed in-house that automates pre-clinical triage and supports safer, faster decision-making in healthcare.


Want to learn more?


www.visibagroup.com

title: Platform DevOps Engineer
description:
**The Wow** 

 As a Platform DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and operating critical platform services that power our applications and customer experiences. This includes managing and optimizing our CDN, Cloud Edge functions, DNS, WAF, and IIS-based applications, while ensuring high availability, scalability, and security across our environments.
 



 You will bring deep technical expertise in AWS cloud services, infrastructure as code, and automation tooling, with a focus on enabling reliable, performant, and secure delivery of applications at the edge. Collaboration with developers, security engineers, and infrastructure teams will be essential to align platform capabilities with organizational goals.
 



 Your contributions will directly support our vision to transition workloads from on-premise infrastructure to modern, cloud-native and edge-optimized platforms.
 


 Product Development at Betsson Group
 
 Our Product Development organisation is truly Global with cross functional teams spanning 6 Tech Hubs – Malta, Budapest, Stockholm, Tallinn, Kyiv and Athens. With nearly 600 strong professionals, the Product Development organisation is spear-headed by our CTO-CPO with all our talented Area Teams working together.
 


 A taster of what you will be involved with
 * Platform Ownership – Manage and optimize CDN, DNS, WAF, edge functions (NodeJS), and IIS applications, ensuring high reliability, security, and performance.
* Cloud & Infrastructure as Code – Design, implement, and maintain infrastructure using Terraform, with a focus on scalability, repeatability, and GitOps best practices.
* Automation & Configuration Management – Build automation workflows using Ansible, and Git to improve deployment velocity and reduce manual effort.
* Cloud Native Transformation – Support the organization’s shift from on-premise to AWS cloud-native workloads, introducing edge-first strategies where appropriate.
* Kubernetes Integration – Collaborate with container platform teams to integrate workloads with Kubernetes where needed, ensuring seamless connectivity with edge services.
* Collaboration & Guidance – Work closely with developers, architects, and security engineers to integrate WAF, CDN, and DNS changes into CI/CD pipelines and delivery processes.
* Monitoring & Reliability – Define and track metrics, logs, and traces across platform services to proactively detect issues, optimize performance, and improve resilience.
* Continuous Improvement – Stay current with industry trends in cloud, CDN, and edge technologies; recommend and implement best practices to evolve the platform.


 You're good at
 * Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience, technical degree beneficial.
* AWS Cloud practitioner or higher would be beneficial.
* Proven hands-on experience with
	+ AWS services (CloudFront, Lambda@Edge, Route 53, WAF, EC2, S3, IAM, etc.)
	+ Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)
	+ Git/GitOps workflows
	+ Kubernetes (good understanding, with ability to integrate workloads)
	+ Configuration management (Ansible)
	+ IIS application management
	+ Scripting (JavaScript/NodeJS preferred)
* Strong understanding of platform reliability, networking fundamentals (DNS, CDN routing, edge services), and application delivery.
* Experience in implementing secure, scalable, and automated infrastructure solutions.
* Knowledge of observability pillars (logs, metrics, tracing) and proactive monitoring practices.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, adapting to new technologies and evolving requirements.
* Familiarity with DevOps principles and ITIL best practices is a plus.
* Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyse complex technical issues and provide effective solutions in a timely manner.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, vendors, and partners.


 Who We Are
 
 Betsson Group is one of the largest companies within the Global iGaming space and can trace our heritage as far back as the 1960’s. We’re Swedish and publicly listed too with our Operational HQ located on the Mediterranean Island of Malta.
 



 We strive to deliver the best customer experience in the industry. As a market leader within iGaming we offer online gaming products across 12+ jurisdictions and 20+ brands.
 



 You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform used by hundreds of thousands of our customers!
 


 What we offer
 

 Much like a rollercoaster, life at Betsson Group is fast-paced, full of twists and turns, and always exciting. With more than
 **2,800** 
 colleagues representing over 75 nationalities
 **across a global network of offices** 
 - including
 **1,500** 
 at our operational headquarters in Malta - every day brings new challenges and opportunities to grow. It may not be for the faint-hearted, but if you thrive on innovation, enjoy pushing boundaries and want to be part of a diverse, international team, then you’ll fit right in at Betsson.
   

  


 We offer numerous challenges where your skills will be put to good use! We encourage innovation, independence and celebrate success where you will be part of multi-cultural and diverse company, with people from all over the world.
   

  




 Challenge Accepted?
 
***By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy***

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta som DevOps Engineer och söker en ny utmaning i karriären? Då kan vi på Eccera hjälpa dig! Vi har flera kunder inom både privat och offentlig sektor i Stockholm som växer och därför söker vi nu flera DevOps som kan bidra med sin kunskap och stärka verksamheterna.
 



  





 Som konsult på Eccera får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som DevOps Engineer spelar du en nyckelroll i att bygga och underhålla infrastruktur som stödjer olika utvecklings- och driftprocesser. Du arbetar nära utvecklingsteamet och kravställare.
 



  





***I denna roll som DevOps Engineer kommer du bland annat arbeta med att:***




*• Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter* 




 • Skapa och underhålla molninfrastruktur med hjälp av verktyg som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud
 



 • Felsöka och lösa tekniska problem relaterade till utveckling och drift
 



 • Implementera och hantera CI/CD-pipelines för kontinuerlig integration och leverans
 



 • Automatisera driftprocesser med hjälp av verktyg som Terraform, Ansible eller Kubernetes
 



 • Samarbeta med utvecklings- och driftavdelningar för att förbättra arbetsflöden och optimera system
 



 • Hantera incidenter
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 




 Rollen kräver ett proaktivt tankesätt och du har ett intresse för att automatisera processer samt lösa komplexa problem. För att lyckas i en roll som DevOps Engineer hos någon av våra kunder ser vi att du har minst två års erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps-verktyg och tekniker som Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Git etc.
 



  





 Som person är du kreativ och tar initiativ till att utveckla och förbättra. Du vågar att testa nytt och tänka annorlunda. Du kan arbeta självständigt samtidigt som du har god samarbetsförmåga.
 



  





**Krav** 




 • Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
 



 • Goda kunskaper om molnplattformar (AWS, Azure, GCP)
 



 • Stark förståelse för infrastruktur som kod (IaC) och automatiseringsverktyg (Terraform, Ansible)
 



 • God kännedom om nätverkskonfiguration och säkerhetsprinciper
 



 • Mycket goda kunskaper i tal och skrift i svenska och engelska
 



  





**Meriterande** 




 • Flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet av systemadministration i en Linuxbaserad produktionsmiljö
 



 • Erfarenhet av scriptprogrammering i Linuxmiljöer så som Python, Ruby, Perl eller motsvarande
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Eccera får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.

title: DevOps Engineer for Telecom OSS IT & Energy (Java, Zenon)
description:
**About the job** 




  





**Role:** 
 DevOps Engineer for Telecom OSS IT & Energy (Java, Zenon)
 



**Experience:** 
 6+ Years
 



**Language requirements:** 
 Swedish + English
 



  





**Tata consultancy Services** 
 is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




  





 Join a high-performing telecom engineering team as a Devops Engineer, where you will drive CI/CD automation, infrastructure modernization, and operational excellence across BSS/OSS systems. You will work on large-scale telecom platforms including billing, CRM, provisioning, and network management while enabling faster releases, high availability, and resilient operations. This role offers deep exposure to Kubernetes, cloud environments, automation frameworks, monitoring tools, and multi-vendor telecom ecosystems in an Agile and DevOps-driven environment.
 



  





**Key Job Responsibilities:** 




  




* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines for Zenon SCADA configurations, scripts, and integrations.
* Implement Infrastructure-as-Code for SCADA servers and related components using tools like Ansible/Terraform.
* Configure dashboards (Grafana/Prometheus or Zenon-native) for energy KPIs, site health, and SLA compliance.
* Enforce RBAC, secure credential management, and TLS encryption for SCADA and OSS integrations.
* Develop scripts and utilities for data ingestion, alarm forwarding, and auto-remediation workflows.
* Support REST/OPC UA integrations between Zenon and OSS/BSS platforms (Inventory, Assurance, Energy dashboards)
* Maintain version control for Zenon projects, SCADA scripts, and automation artifacts in Git repositories.



  





**Experience & Skills Requirements:** 




  





**Must have:** 



* Hands-on experience with Zenon SCADA (project configuration, scripting, OPC UA integration).
* Strong knowledge of DevOps tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps).
* Familiarity with Linux/Windows administration, scripting (Shell/Python), and automation frameworks (Ansible).
* Understanding of ITIL processes for Incident, Problem, and Change management.



  





**Good to have:** 



* Exposure to TM Forum standards (eTOM, SID, ODA).
* Experience with Elastic Stack for observability.
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker/Kubernetes) and cloud-native deployments.



  





**Success Metrics & Unique Selling Proposition (USP) of The Role:** 




  




* Faster and more reliable software delivery through automated CI/CD and containerized deployments.
* Improved system stability, uptime, and SLA performance in large-scale telecom environments.
* Strong impact on cost reduction and operational efficiency through automation and infrastructure-as-code.
* Ability to lead modernization of BSS/OSS platforms using Kubernetes, cloud, and advanced monitoring tools.
* Act as a key driver connecting development, operations, and architecture teams for DevOps excellence.



  





**What we offer / What’s in it for you:** 




  




* Opportunity to work on large-scale telecom platforms with modern DevOps and automation technologies.
* Exposure to cloud, Kubernetes, monitoring ecosystems, and next-gen BSS/OSS modernization initiatives.
* Collaborative environment with cross-functional and global engineering teams.
* Continuous learning and career growth supported by certifications and complex project exposure.
* Ownership of strategic DevOps initiatives with direct impact on operational performance and delivery speed.



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com** 




  





**Privacy Note: https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

title: Senior DevOps Architect
description:
As a Senior DevOps Architect, you’ll shape the technical strategy, architecture, and culture that enable hundreds of engineers to deliver faster, safer, and smarter.
   

  

 You’ll act as both strategic advisor and hands-on enabler, bridging architecture, automation, and leadership across Traton’s global software factory initiatives.
   

  

**Your Future Job**
 You will be part of the DevOps team with creative colleagues and will work in close cooperation with all teams in the project, located both in Sweden and abroad, representing multiple nationalities.
   

  

**Examples of tasks:**
* Define and evolve Traton’s DevOps strategy within the DDU SW Factory
* Using Amazon Web Services (AWS) services such as S3 for object storage, EC2 for virtual server instances, and VPC for networking and security
* Defining an efficient branching strategy and merging approach
* Collaborate across departments to align tooling, processes, and governance
* Drive innovation in deployment models, container orchestration, and automation pipelines
* Design scalable, automated CI/CD frameworks across hybrid and multi-cloud environments
* Evolving DevOps AI practices, integrating AI and machine learning into DevOps workflows for smarter automation, predictive insights, and continuous optimization
* Mentor engineering teams, lead architectural reviews, and guide platform evolution


**Your Profile**
* You are a communicative and cooperative person who takes responsibility for creating and maintaining a great development environment. You have solid experience working as a DevOps professional in larger projects, preferably within the automotive industry.
* With 5–10 years of experience in DevOps and infrastructure roles, you bring both technical depth and an architectural perspective. You have a strategic mindset and are comfortable driving strategic changes that improve processes, tooling, and ways of working across teams.
* Your technical background includes strong knowledge of AWS, GIT, Docker, JIRA, programming, and reading various data formats such as XML, JSON, and YAML. Experience with Android and QNX operating system is highly beneficial.
* You have a B.Sc or M.Sc degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or similar along with relevant work experience.


**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, personal letter, and grade copies. Please apply as soon as possible but no later than 2026-01-07. Ongoing selection and interviews will take place during the application period, the position may be filled before the end of the application period.
   

  

 We use logic and personality tests in our selection process and a background check may be conducted for this position.
   

  

**For more information**
 Please contact :
   

  

 Thomas Richter (Manager TGRAVGS)
   

  

 thomas.richter@scania.com

title: Service Delivery Engineer
description:
**Xensam: Join the Future of SAM**
 Xensam is the leader in AI-powered, cloud-based Software Asset Management. Our technology brings clarity to complex IT environments, helping users make smart, data-driven decisions and maximize software ROI.
   

  

 Recognized with the Highest Growth Award and ranked #3 Overall Champion at the Main Software 50 Awards Nordics, we’re scaling fast and looking for people who want to join the journey. At Xensam, you play a key role in a team built on energy, focus, and positivity. We value experience, but even more, the person behind it.
   

  

 Together, we build the future of SAM.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As our Service Delivery Engineer at Xensam, you’ll be at the intersection of technology and customer experience, ensuring smooth delivery, configuration, and support of our solutions to clients across industries. You’ll collaborate closely with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to implement services, tailor custom development to client needs, resolve issues, and help drive continuous improvement in delivery processes.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 You’ll design, develop, debug, test, and maintain integrations of our services into customer environments. You will also maintain and enhance our Integration Platform, ensuring stability while continuously delivering new features and improvements. Furthermore, you will:
   

  

* Own and manage the end-to-end technical delivery of our platform or services to customers.
* Collaborate with Sales, Support, and Product teams to ensure smooth onboarding and configuration.
* Act as a trusted technical advisor to clients post-sale, ensuring their environments are correctly set up and optimized.
* Troubleshoot and resolve incidents or performance issues, escalating where needed.
* Monitor delivery SLAs and report on service health and incident trends.
* Document processes, deployment configurations, and best practices.
* Continuously identify ways to improve reliability, scalability, and customer experience.


**Qualifications**
* Strong JavaScript knowledge with hands-on experience in building or debugging integrations.
* Solid understanding of REST APIs, including how to consume, debug, and troubleshoot API-based integrations using JSON.
* Good working knowledge of relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and experience querying or inspecting data.
* Familiarity with authentication protocols such as OAuth2, OpenID Connect (OIDC), JWT, and Access Tokens.
* A proactive mindset, strong attention to detail, and a passion for solving customer problems.
* Good communication skills and strong proficiency in written and spoken English.


**Bonus Points If You Have**
* Experience with Node-RED.
* Experience in debugging integrations between cloud services.


**What You Get**
* A generous work culture with free drinks and snacks, office massages, and more.
* Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
* An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.
* A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
* If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
* Other location-specific benefits.


**Our values at Xensam**
**Rebellious**
 We challenge the norm and act with initiative – always with responsibility.
   

  

**Humane**
 We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
   

  

**Harmony**
 We value balance and create a supportive workplace where people thrive.
   

  

 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.
   

  

 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered Software Asset Management technology. Designed to provide SAM Managers and IT Leaders with valuable data, our platform offers a wealth of features to simplify SAM workloads with built-in automation and advanced functionality. We prioritize ease of use and industry-leading security for both On-premise and Cloud software, putting organizations in total control of their hybrid IT environments.

title: Software Engineer, Data Infrastructure & Acquisition - Stockholm, Sweden
description:
The mission of Speechify is to make sure that reading is never a barrier to learning.
   

  

 Over 50 million people use Speechify's text-to-speech products to turn whatever they're reading – PDFs, books, Google Docs, news articles, websites – into audio, so they can read faster, read more, and remember more. Speechify's text-to-speech reading products include its iOS app, Android App, Mac App, Chrome Extension, and Web App. Google recently named Speechify the Chrome Extension of the Year and Apple named Speechify its 2025 Design Award winner for Inclusivity.
   

  

 Today, nearly 200 people around the globe work on Speechify in a 100% distributed setting – Speechify has no office. These include frontend and backend engineers, AI research scientists, and others from Amazon, Microsoft, and Google, leading PhD programs like Stanford, high growth startups like Stripe, Vercel, Bolt, and many founders of their own companies.
   

  

**Overview**
 We're looking to hire for our Data side of our AI team at Speechify. This role is responsible for all aspects of data collection to support our model training operations. We are able to build high-quality datasets at petabyte-scale and low cost through a tight integration of infrastructure, engineering, and research work. We are looking for a skilled Software Engineer to join us.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Be scrappy to find new sources of audio data and bring it into our ingestion pipeline
* Operate and extend the cloud infrastructure for our ingestion pipeline, currently running on GCP and managed with Terraform.
* Collaborate closely with our Scientists to shift the cost/throughput/quality frontier, delivering richer data at bigger scale and lower cost to power our next-generation models.
* Collaborate with others on the AI Team and Speechify Leadership to craft the AI Team's dataset roadmap to power Speechify's next-generation consumer and enterprise products.


**An Ideal Candidate Should Have**
* BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or a related field.
* 5+ years of industry experience in software development.
* Proficiency with bash/Python scripting in Linux environments
* Proficiency in Docker and Infrastructure-as-Code concepts and professional experience with at least one major Cloud Provider (we use GCP)
* Experience with web crawlers, large-scale data processing workflows is a plus
* Ability to handle multiple tasks and adapt to changing priorities.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.


**What we offer**
* A fast-growing environment where you can help shape the company and product.
* An entrepreneurial-minded team that supports risk, intuition, and hustle.
* A hands-off management approach so you can focus and do your best work.
* An opportunity to make a big impact in a transformative industry.
* Competitive salaries, a friendly and laid-back atmosphere, and a commitment to building a great asynchronous culture.
* Opportunity to work on a life-changing product that millions of people use.
* Build products that directly impact and support people with learning differences like dyslexia, ADD, low vision, concussions, autism, and more.
* Work in one of the fastest-growing sectors of tech, the intersection of artificial intelligence and audio.


**Think you're a good fit for this job?**
 Tell us more about yourself and why you're interested in the role when you apply.
   

  

 And don't forget to include links to your portfolio and LinkedIn.
   

  

**Not looking but know someone who would make a great fit?**
 Refer them!
   

  

**Speechify is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace.**
 Speechify does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

title: Erfaren fullstackutvecklare
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

 Som anställd på IT-avdelningen är du delaktig i ett viktigt samhällsuppdrag med många spännande verksamhetsområden och en möjlighet att göra skillnad på riktigt. Våra system används i polisernas vardag dygnet runt, året runt. Från att ha säker gränsövervakning till att färdigställa en förundersökning inför en rättegång.
   

  

 Polismyndighetens IT-avdelning har drygt 1300 anställda med ansvar för all IT som används av myndighetens 40 000 anställda. Vi i gruppen Gränsövervakning utvecklar tekniskt avancerade system från grunden för att ge poliser och gränskontrollanter rätt förutsättningar att förebygga och förhindra brott. Vår grupp som består av systemutvecklare, kravanalytiker, uppdragsledare, testare, lösningsarkitekt, BI-utvecklare och teknisk produktspecialist, behöver nu utökas med ytterligare engagerad systemutvecklare. Hos oss kommer det du utvecklar att bidra till ett säkrare Sverige!
   

  

 Läs mer om uppdraget här: https://polisen.se/jobb-och-utbildning/jobba-hos-polisen/jobb-it-avdelningen/it/arvid-fullstack-utvecklare/
   

  

 Vårt kontor är beläget i moderna lokaler i centrala Stockholm. Vi erbjuder flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån upp till 2 dagar i veckan. Vi värdesätter en bra balans mellan arbete och fritid där du har stora möjligheter att påverka din vardag.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Som fullstackutvecklare hos oss är du en del av vårt härliga, självorganiserande agila utvecklingsteam. I det dagliga arbetet kommer du tillsammans med teamet att utveckla nya system, vara med och ta fram lösningar och arkitektur, vara delaktig i tekniska val, optimera prestanda, få till integrationer, upprätthålla säkerheten och mycket annat som hör till utveckling av säkra system för gränsövervakning. Systemen vi utvecklar har vi hand om även i produktion. För att förstå verksamhetens behov kommer du att göra verksamhetsbesök.
   

  

 Vår målsättning är att utvecklas, ha roligt på jobbet och leverera rätt saker i rätt tid genom kontinuerliga mindre leveranser och genom att ständigt utvärdera hur vi arbetar. Vi alla har ett agilt mindset där vi levererar tillsammans och hjälper till där vi kan.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:**
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT alternativt motsvarande utbildning samt förvärvad erfarenhet som Polismyndigheten bedömer som likvärdig
* Flera års aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla moderna webbapplikationer med Spring Boot och React JS (alternativt motsvarande javascript ramverk)
* Erfarenhet av design och deltagande i planering av systemarkitektur
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska både tal och skrift
* Goda kunskaper i engelska både tal och skrift


 Anställningen kräver svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

**Det är meriterande om du även har:**
* Flera års arbetslivserfarenhet av agil metodik i utvecklingsteam
* Erfarenhet av relationsdatabaser
* Erfarenhet av containerarkitektur
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla AI förmågor och arbete med AI-stödd utveckling
* Erfarenhet av elastic stacken
* Erfarenhet av att bygga datawarehouse


**Personliga egenskaper:**
 Vi söker dig som har ett agilt mindset, vill utvecklas och hänga med i den senaste tekniken. Du är prestigelös, tekniskt skicklig och tar dig gärna an och löser komplexa arbetsuppgifter.
   

  

 Du trivs med att arbeta i grupp och drivs av ditt teams framgångar. Arbetet kräver även att du kan arbeta självständigt och att du har en förmåga att ta initiativ med ett lösningsorienterat förhållningssätt och är bekväm med att fatta egna beslut. Vi ser även att är modig, kommer med idéer och vågar tänka nytt.
   

  

 Tycker du dessutom att det är roligt att inspirera andra och delar med dig av din kunskap kommer du att trivas hos oss.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter dina personliga egenskaper högt och kommer lägga mycket stor vikt vid dessa för att hitta rätt person för rollen.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att ta kontakt via, tfn 010- 56 374 75
   

  

 Har du frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig HR-konsult: Amanda Gimmerborn, amanda.gimmerborn@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Saco-S, saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn 010-563 87 10
   

  

 ST, st.inom-polisen@polisen.se
   

  

 Seko Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn 073-249 04 22
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med provanställning om sex månader
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Förtroendearbetstid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Systemutvecklare
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna i ditt ansökningsmejl. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Det är därför viktigt att du svarar tydligt och utförligt på frågorna och inte hänvisar till andra handlingar t.ex. CV.
   

  

**Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.**
 Besvara följande urvalsfrågor som en del av din ansökan.
   

  

* Har du akademisk utbildning inom IT alternativt motsvarande utbildning? JA/NEJ, om JA beskriv din utbildning.
* Har du flera års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utveckla moderna webbapplikationer med Spring Boot och React JS (alternativt motsvarande javascript ramverk)? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet samt i vilken omfattning har du arbetat med detta och när?
* Har du erfarenhet av design och deltagande i planering av systemarkitektur? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet samt i vilken omfattning har du arbetat med detta och när?
* Har du mycket goda kunskaper i svenska både tal och skrift? JA/NEJ
* Har du goda kunskaper i engelska både tal och skrift? JA/NEJ
* Har du svenskt medborgarskap? JA/NEJ
* Har du flera års arbetslivserfarenhet av agil metodik i utvecklingsteam? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet av agil metodik samt hur utvecklingsteamet har sett ut.
* Har du erfarenhet av relationsdatabaser? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet.
* Har du erfarenhet av containerarkitektur? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet.
* Har du erfarenhet av att utveckla AI förmågor och arbete med AI-stödd utveckling? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet.
* Har du erfarenhet av elastic stacken? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet.
* Har du erfarenhet av att bygga datawarehouse? JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet.


 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
   

  

 De uppgifter du lämnar i samband med din ansökan kan användas för att kontakta dig, få information och kallelser samt eventuella anställningshandlingar.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och svar på urvalsfrågor via e-post till jobb.na@polisen.se
 **senast den 13/1 2026.** 
 Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via den mailadress som anges i annonsen.
 **Märk din ansökan med referensnummer A760.750/2025 i mailets ärendemening.**
 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) genomförs innan beslut om anställning fattas. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om krigsplacering och säkerhetsprövning under https://polisen.se/krigsplacering och https://polisen.se/sakerhetsprovning
   

  

 Polismyndigheten kommer att behandla dina personuppgifter i enlighet med reglerna i EU:s dataskyddsförordning (2016/679) och annan tillämplig dataskyddsreglering. Läs mer om vår hantering av personuppgifter på https://polisen.se/personuppgifter/rekrytering
   

  

 Din ansökan är en allmän handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen.
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Vi undanber oss samtal och mejl från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Sök jobbet
   

  

 Ansök via e-post

title: Senior C++ Developer
description:
At Broadridge, we've built a culture where the highest goal is to empower others to accomplish more. If you’re passionate about developing your career, while helping others along the way, come join the Broadridge team.
   

  

 We are seeking
 **Senior C++ Software Engineers** 
 to help us drive our strategic vision transforming the trading landscape for our clients globally.
   

  

 Our associates embrace change, easily integrate, and succeed in a fast-paced global environment.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Participate in the design, development and testing of financial markets software products
* Developing and integrating different ways of information visualization
* Evolve technically while working on data-intensive latency-sensitive products
* Provide and receive constant technical feedback via well-established code-review practices
* Ensure internal quality standards are met through automated testing (e.g. unit, integration, performance, and throughput tests, etc.)
* Learn and improve your expertise in financial assets, investment banking, and financial technology
* Contribute and promote best practices in our development cycles using continuous integration.


**Profile Needed**
**Mandatory:**
* A bachelor’s degree from a recognized college or university in STEM, such as math, physics, computer science, engineering, etc.
* Over 8 years of C++ development experience in С++
* Solid knowledge of C++ features and programming techniques
* Comprehensive knowledge of basic algorithms and data structures
* Good understanding of modern C++ standards (C++ 17/20)
* Experience in debugging and troubleshooting
* Ability to work both independently and as part of a global team
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with an attention to detail
* Familiar with applying OOP concepts in environments with challenging performance demands
* Good communication skills with an effective level of English proficiency


**Beneficial:**
* Knowledge of financial markets and financial technologies
* Linux/Unix experience on advanced user or admin level
* Experience in multi-threaded programming
* Experience in low-latency software design, performance profiling and optimization
* Knowledge of Internet protocol suite and network programming
* Knowledge of the LLVM toolchain
* Understanding of functional programming concepts
* Experience in other programming languages (Java, Python, Shell scripting, Rust, Haskell, etc.)


**About Us**
 Broadridge Trading & Connectivity Solutions (BTCS) products and services power high-performance multi-asset trading automating the entire front office for investment banks and brokers. BTCS services cover all aspects of agency and principal risk trading, client connectivity services, Middle-Office and post-trade matching. Assets supported include Equities, FX, Derivatives. crypto and ETFs across all global markets.
   

  

 We are dedicated to fostering a collaborative, engaging, and inclusive environment and are committed to providing a workplace that empowers associates to be authentic and bring their best to work. We believe that associates do their best when they feel safe, understood, and valued, and we work diligently and collaboratively to ensure Broadridge is a company—and ultimately a community—that recognizes and celebrates everyone’s unique perspective.
   

  

**Use of AI in Hiring**
 As part of the recruiting process, Broadridge may use technology, including artificial intelligence (AI)-based tools, to help review and evaluate applications. These tools are used only to support our recruiters and hiring managers, and all employment decisions include human review to ensure fairness, accuracy, and compliance with applicable laws. Please note that honesty and transparency are critical to our hiring process. Any attempt to falsify, misrepresent, or disguise information in an application, resume, assessment, or interview will result in disqualification from consideration.

title: Pega Certified Lead System Architect
description:
Permanent Employment – Sweden
   

  

 Experience Level: 10+ years in Pega development
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are seeking a highly experienced Pega Certified Lead System Architect (CLSA) with applications built on Pega Constellation architecture. The ideal candidate will have deep experience in Pega platform capabilities, particularly with Constellation UX, and will work closely with stakeholders, developers, and architects to translate business requirements into end-to-end solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the design and development of Pega applications using Pega Constellation and latest features of Pega Infinity.
* Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to ensure alignment between Blueprint models and Pega implementations.
* Define high-level architecture and design patterns for Pega solutions.
* Provide technical leadership and mentorship to development teams.
* Ensure adherence to Pega best practices and coding standards.
* Participate in all phases of the SDLC including design, development, testing, and deployment.
* Create and maintain technical documentation.
* Troubleshoot and resolve performance issues and bugs.


**Required Skills & Qualifications**
* Pega CLSA Certification (mandatory).
* Extensive experience with latest Pega (minimum 8.x) platform.
* Hands-on experience with Blueprint for process modelling and requirement gathering.
* Expertise in Pega Constellation, Case Management, workflow, and Integration.
* Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and design principles.
* Experience with Agile methodologies and tools like JIRA.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Experience with Pega DevOps and CI/CD pipelines.
* Knowledge of Pega DX API and UI/UX best practices.
* Knowledge of emerging PEGA GenAI Features
* Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Knowledge of Pega frameworks (CS / KYC ) or CDH is a plus


**About Cognizant**
 Cognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 194 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant.

title: Cobolutvecklare till Folksam
description:
Vi utvecklar vår organisation och arbetssätt – ett viktigt steg mot att bli ett ännu enklare, snabbare, mer lönsamt och kundorienterat Folksam. IT sak befinner sig i ett intensivt och spännande utvecklingsskede. Vi moderniserar hela vår sakaffär och förflyttar den till målplattformen IDIT. Samtidigt pågår betydande nyutveckling i våra Mainframe-system, där digitalisering och automatisering står i centrum. Det är ett område med hög affärspuls – och du kommer att vara mitt i händelsernas centrum.
 



  





 Vi söker nu Cobolutvecklare till vårt team– ett team där det händer mycket! Vill du vara med på vår resa?
 



  





**Det här gör du som Cobolutvecklare på IT Sak** 




 Som Cobolutvecklare hos oss arbetar du med nyutveckling, förvaltning och livscykelhantering av våra system som primärt stöttar motor- och djuraffären. Du är en del av ett agilt team där du får jobba med allt från analys och design till kodning och test. Vi har ett nära samarbete med både verksamhet och resten av IT, och du blir en viktig del i att skapa smarta lösningar som gör verklig skillnad.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som vill vara med och bygga både samtida och framtida försäkringslösningar – samtidigt som du bidrar till att vi har kul, firar framgångar och utvecklas tillsammans. Teamet består av kompetenta kollegor i mixade åldrar med olika bakgrunder, roller och erfarenheter – från systemutvecklare till kravanalytiker och testare. Du jobbar nära 6 kollegor som också jobbar med cobolutveckling. Gruppen har hög kompetens med tajt samarbete där alla delar med sig av sina erfarenheter.
 



  





 Sektionen IT Sak ansvarar för Folksams system inom sakförsäkring. Vi är cirka 120 medarbetare, organiserade i en sektionschef, två avdelningschefer och sju gruppchefer. totalt inom vår IT-enhet består av cirka 750 engagerade medarbetare fördelade på nio sektioner.
 



 Läs gärna mer om hur Maria berättar om sin roll som Cobolutvecklare hos oss,
 
 Möt Maria, Cobolutvecklare - Folksam
 




  





**Är du den vi söker?** 




 Vi söker dig som har minst sju års erfarenhet av Cobolutveckling och som trivs i en miljö där både förvaltning och nyutveckling är en självklar del av vardagen. Du gillar att jobba agilt och vill vara med och påverka både teknik och affär. Har du dessutom erfarenhet från försäkringsbranschen – särskilt sakförsäkring – är det ett stort plus.
 



  





 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har flerårig erfarenhet av:
 


* COBOL-utveckling på IBM Z Mainframe – med fokus på både nyutveckling och vidareutveckling av befintliga system.
* CICS – för att hantera transaktioner i realtid.
* JCL – för batchhantering och styrning av jobb.
* DB2 och SQL – för databashantering och affärslogik (mycket meriterande).
* AQT (Advanced Query Tool) – för effektiv databasutveckling och felsökning (meriterande).
* Compuware Topaz – för modern utveckling och analys i mainframe-miljö (meriterande).



  





 Du är ansvarstagande, nyfiken och gillar att driva saker framåt. Du vill vara med på resan mot vår nya plattform IDIT – men också bidra till att våra befintliga system blir ännu smartare, mer automatiserade och affärsstödjande.
 



  





**Här kan du göra skillnad** 




 Välkommen till Folksam – här driver du viktiga frågor framåt. Från de avgörande detaljerna till de stora perspektiven, med fokus på att förenkla våra kunders vardag. Det gör att du bidrar till något större, oavsett roll. Här finns det många roliga, utvecklande jobb och du har goda chanser till en spännande karriär.
 



  





 Vi tror på ett hållbart arbetsliv och jobbar aktivt med inkludering och mångfald. Våra moderna kontor bjuder in till samarbete och lärande, här får vi saker att hända! Du har flexibiliteten att kunna varva arbete på kontoret med att jobba hemifrån, utifrån verksamhetens behov.
 



 Läs mer och se filmer om livet hos oss på
 
 folksam.se/jobb-och-karriar
 




  





**Så söker du jobbet** 




 Välkommen med din ansökan senast 18 januari 2026. Vi intervjuar löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan nu!
 



  





 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten? Kontakta gärna gruppchef Cecilia Palmgren, 070-831 57 66, cecilia.palmgren@folksam.se
 



  





 Fackliga representanter: Akademikerföreningen Per Hansson 070-831 60 67, Forena Morgan Svensson 073-423 59 12 och Handels Mikael Carlsson 070-831 51 32.

title: Senior SAP ABAP Developer- Interfaces, Master Data & Finance | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
SEB Kort is looking for an experienced, technically strong, and driven
 **SAP Senior ABAP Developer** 
 with a focus on
 **interfaces and SAP Adapter development** 
 . You are passionate about building robust, secure, and scalable systems, and you thrive on solving complex technical challenges while sharing knowledge and improving ways of working.
   

  

 Joining our dynamic international team, you will play a key role in our mission to be the market leader for corporate payments in Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 You will join the SAP platform team and contribute to a state-of-the-art S/4HANA landscape. In addition to coordinating with other expert teams in the SAP environment (billing/charging/invoicing), you will be responsible for the development and further development of various SAP interfaces (primarily Microsoft Dynamics 365).
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* In the context of a modern S/4HANA landscape, you will be responsible for planning, designing, customising, developing and testing ABAP programmes
* Customer-specific ABAP developments throughout the entire software lifecycle and, in particular, the connection of our CRM system Microsoft Dynamics 365 to the SAP landscape
* ABAP software engineering activities with a focus on interfaces (API, SOAP, REST, iFrame, microservices)
* Analysing and resolving technical and application-related problems and incidents
* Supporting regulatory audits in the context of ABAP developments and the software development process
* Supporting and adapting the software development process, enhancements and deployment concepts in relation to ABAP developments
* Ensuring high standards in code quality, testing, documentation, and system performance
* Taking an active role in sharing your knowledge and contributing to improving customer experience


**Who We Are Looking For**
* A degree in Computer Science or a comparable qualification
* Extensive experience in ABAP development
* Strong experience in interface development and integration technologies
* Good knowledge of customer master data (e.g., which attributes belong to customer master data and how they are used in SAP)
* Solid experience working with SOAP interfaces (SOAP is used in SAP Keystone)
* Basic SAP finance knowledge (e.g., understanding finance-related flows and how integrations impact FI/CO processes and reporting)
* Knowledge of SAP business processes end-to-end (E2E)
* Strong conceptual and analytical skills and a goal-oriented working style
* Practical experience with DevOps and agile methodologies
* Fluency in English


**Personality**
 We believe you are an experienced developer who combines strong technical skills with excellent communication ability. You are a problem-solver, team player, and systems thinker who takes initiative and contributes to the bigger picture, always with the customer in mind.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Excellent office environment
* Work-life balance


**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than
 **18th of January, 2026** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Elinor Franzén, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elinor.franzen@seb.se.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Fullstackutvecklare .NET och Javascript till team Fundamentals - Ving
description:
**Till Ving letar vi efter en erfaren och driven fullstackutvecklare som vill vara en del av ett fantastiskt team där kvalitet, samarbete och teknisk innovation står i fokus.** 




  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Vi söker en fullstackutvecklare till ett team som utvecklar marknades bästa webb och mobilappsplattform. Hos oss jobbar vi agilt i snabba releasecykler och med continuous delivery. Teamen jobbar med sin egen variant av Scrum/Kanban och ansvarar för hela kedjan från kravförståelse, utveckling, deploy till förvaltning och support. Vår strategi är ”Cloud first” varför vi värdesätter kunskap om molnlösningar och Azure.
 



  





 I denna roll blir du en del av ett av våra kundkanalsplattforms-team, där vi jobbar i högt tempo och med ett starkt kvalitetstänk. Teamet utvecklar och underhåller bla vårt CMS, i vilket våra redaktörer skapar våra webbar. Våra systerteam som skapar våra webbar och appar jobbar vi också tight med för att få den bästa digitala upplevelsen för våra kunder. Du får arbeta med komplexa systemlösningar som används både i Norden och på våra internationella destinationer.
 



 Vi strävar efter att skapa lösningar som gör verklig skillnad, och vi välkomnar en kollega som delar vår passion för teknik och utveckling.
 



  





 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:
 


* Samverka med stakeholders (ex webbredaktörer) för att förstå behov och krav
* Designa och utveckla lösningar
* Säkerställa kvalitet genom tex Codereviews, tester
* Automatisera infrastruktur och releaseflöden i Azure med IaC (Bicep m.m.), CI/CD och observability practices.
* Jobba ihop med andra team för att leverera på helheten



  





**Vår tekniska miljö** 




 Vi är 13 utvecklingsteam på IT-avdelningen i Stockholm som tillsammans driver utvecklingen framåt. Våra system byggs i en modern Microsoft-miljö och vi arbetar med aktuella tekniker, ramverk och verktyg som .NET Core, C#, Node, Azure, React, React Native, JavaScript, GraphQL, MS-SQL och Redis.
 



  





 I linje med vår cloud-first-strategi satsar vi på skalbara och framtidssäkra lösningar där innovation, prestanda och kvalitet alltid står i fokus.
 



 Läs mer om
 **vår IT-avdelning här** 
 🧑 💻
 



  





**Vem vi söker** 




 Vi söker dig som är nyfiken, noggrann, kommunikativ och trivs med att arbeta i team. Du brinner för kodning och ser värdet i att samarbeta för att nå gemensamma mål. Du har en förmåga att arbeta proaktivt, se helheten och driva utvecklingen framåt.
 



 Du har en god förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta med dina kollegor samt att dela kunskap och bidra till en öppen och lärande kultur.
 



 Vi ser gärna att du har ett intresse för DevOps och tycker om att driva frågor kopplade till automatisering, CI/CD och infrastruktur som kod. Du uppskattar att samarbeta med både utvecklare och driftteam för att skapa effektiva och hållbara lösningar.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling inom C#.NET
* Erfarenhet av react
* Relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila team och metoder som SCRUM eller Kanban
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift
* Stark lagspelare som bidrar till teamets framgång
* Molnbaserade tjänster (gärna Azure)



  





**Meriterande erfarenheter** 




 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
 


* Headless CMS (Umbraco)
* Intresse för DevOps och förmåga att driva frågor inom området
* Testdriven utveckling (TDD) gärna med hjälp av AI
* Par-/mobbprogrammering



  





**Vi erbjuder** 




 Vi erbjuder en spännande och utvecklande miljö där du får möjlighet att utvecklas och påverka. Du får en omväxlande vardag tillsammans med härliga kollegor - vi arbetar i nära samarbete med andra team och verksamheter för att ge våra gäster de bästa veckorna på året. Vi har dessutom ett högt medarbetarengagemang som år efter år visar sig i vår interna medarbetarundersökning. Vi älskar vårt jobb och välkomnar dig ombord på vår resa i Nordic Leisure Travel Group!
 



 Läs mer om vad vi erbjuder här 🏄
 



**Övrigt** 




 Tjänsten är en heltidstjänst och placerad på Vings fina huvudkontor på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. Det är möjligt med distansarbete upp till 2 dagar per vecka när det passar för teamet/arbetsuppgiften.
 



  





 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
 



  





**I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av tester från Alva Labs – ett logiskt problemlösningstest och en personlighetsanalys. Testerna utgår från vedertagen forskning och ger oss möjlighet att på ett mer objektivt sätt bedöma dina styrkor och eventuella utmaningar i relation till aktuell tjänst. Du får mer information när du skickat in din ansökan, men om du är nyfiken redan nu kan du läsa mer hos** 
**Alva Labs** 
**.** 




  





**Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en bakgrundskontroll att genomföras.** 




  





*Ving ingår i den nordiska resekoncernen Nordic Leisure Travel Group. I gruppen ingår researrangörerna Ving Sverige, Globetrotter, Ving Norge, Spies i Danmark, Tjäreborg i Finland, flygbolaget Sunclass Airlines samt våra egna hotellkoncept Sunwing Family Resorts, Ocean Beach Club och Sunprime Hotels. Gruppen säljer ett normalt år runt 1 250 000 resor i de nordiska länderna.* 




*Vi är ett företag där vi har roligt och bryr oss om varandra med vårt people promise "it should be fun, developing and rewarding doing a good job".*

title: Associate Support Specialist
description:
**LOCATION: STOCKHOLM, SWEDEN**

**FULL-TIME, PERMANENT**

**HYBRID – 3 DAYS IN THE OFFICE**

***Please submit your resume in English!***

Notified is growing and we are hiring an Associate Support Specialist for the Client Service Delivery team in Stockholm.


The Associate Support Specialist is responsible for database administration, account creation, and customer service within the Public Relations line of business. Your role will be to ensure customer service delivery in an accurate and timely manner while upholding security protocols.


You will serve as a subject matter expert for Notified Public Relations Cloud products, providing day-to-day client advice and support. You will also promote the organization’s capabilities to clients and identify sales opportunities to be forwarded to the account managers in the Sales Department resulting in contract extensions or additional business within the account(s).  



**Your task would include:**

* providing day-to-day client advice, working to maintain strong client relationships
* communicating clearly with clients via phone, email, and chat
* responding to basic client support inquiries, ensuring they are handled in order of priority
* participating in analysis and resolution of unresolved support issues, escalating more complex issues to senior colleagues
* assisting in solving problems for clients, ensuring that SLAs and KPIs are met
* performing administrative duties including account and user maintenance outcomes using good interpersonal skills and organizational skills
collaborating with teammates to work occasional overtime during high volume periods of other Notified service offerings  
* 

**What will you bring?**

* Excellent Swedish & English speaking and writing skills
* Minimum of 1 year of experience in a client-facing position
* Previous newswire experience is preferred
* Customer service experience in a fast-paced environment
* Experience in support of complex products will be considered an advantage.
* Excellent multi-tasking skills
* Exceptional time-management skills, ability to prioritize assignments and meet deadlines
* Projects self-confidence, enthusiasm, and a positive, can-do attitude
Tech savvy mindset and ability to learn new programs/software quickly  
* 

**Why Notified…**

We place a lot of value in giving our clients the solutions and support they need to operate efficiently and successfully. This same desire we use to set our customers up for success applies to our employees as well. Notified committed to helping our employees and their families maintain a healthy work/life balance, to build a financially secure future. Self-development and learning are key with all our global employees having access to our internal learning and development university DevelopU for career and skills enhancement.  



**About NOTIFIED!**

We believe everyone has a story to tell and we’re passionate about helping people and brands amplify their stories across the globe. We are proud to be the number one provider of enterprise webcasting and investor relations content distribution, as well as a global leader in press release distribution. Our clients have used Notified to monitor over 2 billion social media conversations every year! Our products are built so storytellers can do their best work. But we’re not just a platform—personalized, caring service is how we operate. We add a personal touch to everything we do. We strive to deliver wisdom and insight by helping our clients reach global and targeted audiences, measure outcomes, and fulfill their commitments.  



**What’s Next…**

Qualified candidates will be contacted by a member of our in-house recruitment team to kick-start the recruitment process. If you are a possible fit, you will be invited to meet with a few key individuals in order to help you get a full understanding of the team and the position. Our goal is for you to get to know us as we get to know you!


**Apply now to join our successful team!**

**Please Note**

Subject to local legislation, and as applicable to the position to which you have applied, Notified may require your consent at the point of offer to complete certain background screening checks including (but not limited to) Legal right to work in the relevant country, reference checks, Credit checks and Criminal checks. Failure to complete these checks / meet the required criteria may result in offer withdrawal.  



#LI-AD1 #LI-Hybrid
